title: 0.42.0: Heap memory increased

labels.name: prio-high
labels.description: Resolve issues as soon as possible.

labels.name: scope-memory
labels.description: Issues to reduce and improve memory usage.

body:
This is because we access validators a lot when processing attestations for altair, with the current status of prater, it's ~20_000 `state.validators.get()` calls per block. I notice that after each block is processed, the state is committed and the cached nodes inside view DU are gone, so it has to recreate the cached nodes of validators again.

see https://github.com/ChainSafe/lodestar/blob/551ad74e316c5ca84aa666b5ce71ae3d1a0f7ac3/packages/state-transition/src/block/processAttestationsAltair.ts#L99

The test result

- 0.42.0 or unstable: 1.45GB
- without accessing validator in `processAttestationAltair`: 950MB
